𔐣 #POST after vs 𔐎 #PRAE before ⇔ preach sprech

𓆱 𓐍 𓏏 aghter 𒂕 #arkatu arku™ 𒂕 EGIR eĝir achter "after"

𒂕 EGIR eĝir arku™ aghter after

𓆱 agh as in achmet at the BACK of the throat!

𓈌 Axt Achter horizon
𓊢 aHa Ära era eher Ähre achter:after

𒌌𒌅 ul-tu ultu ultima ultra after 𒌌𒌅 ulᶠtu after 𒌌𒌓 ul-tú alter after 𒌌𒌓 ul-tú out of #ištu
